semantic_identifier: [GOLD-156]: Add inbound sync: ingest Jira/Linear issue updates into Issue_Tracker issue object
title: Add inbound sync: ingest Jira/Linear issue updates into Issue_Tracker issue object

sections.text: Implement the downstream (inbound) sync path so changes made in Jira/Linear (status/state, priority, title, labels, and assignee) are reflected back on the linked Issue_Tracker issue object. Use polling initially (webhooks in a later ticket) and update only fields that are mapped/configured to avoid overwriting Issue_Tracker-specific context. Persist last_synced_at + external updated_at to support incremental fetch and idempotent processing, and log/alert on permission or missing-issue errors without breaking the link.
